name: Never Forget Her Flame
desc:
"Come, come to me..."
A vivid memory, guided by flames, envelops her body and soul.
The bygone days had fallen into the grave, is that true?
"Hush, don't weep, don't resist..."
She brands herself onto others' hearts, as strange gazes gradually turn familiar.
"Do you remember now?"
As the embers of old memories scatter away, her face carries a trace of intoxicating floral fragrance...
"I am your memory."
